data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 2,462 believers living in the county of Meuse. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Meuse, Grand Est, France
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 2,462 believers in Meuse, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary: On average, 16 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Meuse, Grand Est, France.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 200,400 people living in Meuse through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 2,462 believers in the county of Meuse to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Commercy
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Commercy, Grand Est, France.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Meuse, Grand Est, France.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Meuse.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 2,462 believers in Meuse, Grand Est, France how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.
